results.title: Battle for Australia
results.creator_credit: Jean King and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: I have vivid memories of watching the Army march along Swanston Street, fit and tanned with heads held high, wearing the famous slouch hat. Jean King’s husband was a navy salvage diver during World War II, and she shares her experiences of being the wife of a war veteran as well as the toll the war took on families and the returned after the war

results.title: Mary and Max: The Exhibition: interview with Adam Elliot March 2010

video_links.name: Mary and Max: The Exhibition: interview with Adam Elliot March 2010

results.brief_description: Oscar winning animation director and writer Adam Elliot speaks candidly about his stop frame animation processes and, more importantly, about why he makes films. Adam also talks about the challenges he faced during the making of his first feature film ‘Mary and Max’.

results.title: Ladies of Lockington
results.creator_credit: Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI
results.brief_description: Meet the ladies who are at the heart of Lockington. These passionate and committed women get things done. They network, coordinate, manage and harness the talent that is available to them to improve and enhance the quality of life for all the families of Lockington and surrounding districts.

results.title: Living in Locky: The Youth Perspective
results.creator_credit: David Withers, Astrid Scott and ACMI
results.brief_description: 17 year old Locky local, Emma McInnes interviews a cross section of young people to find out what life in a rural town is really like. What is there to do? What the future holds and the all important question, are there many lookers in Locky?

results.title: Lockington Living Heritage Complex
results.creator_credit: David Meagher, Astrid Scott and ACMI
results.brief_description: Celebrating and preserving the rich history of Lockington and its surrounding district, the dedicated and hard working volunteers of the Lockington Living Heritage Complex take us on a tour of the complex with the highlight being ‘The Big Shed’ which at 106 metres houses a restored Melbourne tram and the first ever pop top caravan, hand built in Lockington.

results.title: TV50 Celebrity Interviews
results.creator_credit: ACMI Content Development, Astrid Scott and ACMI
results.brief_description: Interviews with thirteen celebrities from Australian television. Asked the same questions, their responses are recorded vox pop style. Questions asked concern the celebrities’ experiences of television both as a viewer and as a personality and performer as well as their thoughts on reality television and the state of Australian television in general. Interviews were conducted at ACMI for the TV50 exhibition in 2006.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Content Development, Astrid Scott and ACMI

Interviews were conducted at ACMI for the TV50 exhibition in 2006.

results.title: ACMI in the Regions: Remembering Culgoa Primary School
results.creator_credit: Csilla Csongvay, David Meagher and ACMI
results.brief_description: The Culgoa Primary School closed its doors for the last time in December 2008, after over 100 years of service, due to the low student intake for the coming year. This film captures moments from a reunion organised to bring together students and teachers in celebration of times past. The town and its people are evidence of the strength and fragility of modern day living in small rural towns. The real, everyday struggles that farmers face and the heartbreaking decisions that families make, whether to stay and “tough it out” or move to a larger satellite town.
results.title_for_label: ACMI in the Regions: Remembering Culgoa Primary School

results.title: Colbo Nights
results.creator_credit: Dean Lawry, Kim Montgomery and ACMI
results.brief_description: Football practice, barbequed snags and a couple of beers at the pub. This is Thursday night in Colbinabbin and you can meet local characters such as Slab, Meathead and Stewballs. The atmosphere is one of a close knit community that loves sports, live music and supports each other through good times and bad.
